price: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tulizidiwa na uovu wetu na tukawa watu tulio potea.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ
footnotes: Watasema nao wanakiri makosa yao : Ewe Mola wetu Mlezi! Maasi yetu yalikuwa mengi, ndio yakatupatia mashaka, na tukawa wenye kupotea tukaiacha njia ya sawa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
